name: C.T.A. DELUXE
description:
A short and fun side scrolling shoot em up.

Run through 9 unique levels to defeat German forces and take down Hitler once and for all.

Controls:

  • Left/Right Arrows - Move
  • Up/Down Arrows - Aiming
  • Z - Jump
  • X - Shoot
  • C - Roll (voids all damage)
  • Shift - Run
  • A - Swap Weapons
